projects.title: Autonomous Drone
projects.description: Our team built an autonomous drone capable of performing complex maneuvers and tasks. It uses advanced computer vision algorithms to navigate its surroundings and complete missions.

projects.title: Robot Arm Assembly
projects.description: In this project, we designed and assembled a robotic arm capable of precise movements and gripping objects. The arm is controlled using a combination of sensors and actuators.

projects.title: Swarm Drones
projects.description: We built a swarm of drones that can work together to complete tasks. Each drone is equipped with sensors and actuators, allowing it to communicate with other drones and coordinate its actions.

projects.title: Line Following Robot
projects.description: We developed a robot that can follow a predefined path marked by a line on the ground. The robot uses infrared sensors to detect the line and adjust its movements accordingly.

projects.title: Talking Robot
projects.description: Our team built a robot that can speak and interact with humans. It uses speech recognition software to understand commands and respond accordingly. The robot also has a face that can display emotions.

projects.title: Obstacle Avoidance Robot
projects.description: Our team built a robot that can navigate through an environment while avoiding obstacles. It uses ultrasonic sensors to detect objects in its path and adjusts its trajectory accordingly.

projects.title: Sumo Robot Competition
projects.description: We participated in a sumo robot competition where our robot had to push the opponent's robot out of a ring. Our robot was designed for strength and agility, utilizing powerful motors and strategic maneuvering.

projects.title: Robotics Workshop for Beginners
projects.description: We organized a workshop aimed at introducing beginners to the world of robotics. Participants learned the basics of robot design, programming, and had hands-on experience building simple robots.
